name: 5 Day 4 Night Cultural Tour in Bhutan
description: In our Bhutan 5D4N cultural tour, you can be sure to experience the beauty that Bhutan has to offer. Your flight to Paro is considered one of the most spectacular flight experiences in the world. While flying in and out of Bhutan, one can see Mt. Everest, Kanchenjunga, Makula, and other high peaks such as Jumolhari, Jichu Drakey, and Tsrim Gang. Arriving in the airport in Paro, you will be received by a representative of Best Bhutan Travel.
